Ella se encarga de elaborar el pan y así mismo pasteles, que posteriormente comercializa en su casa de habitación, así mismo les entrega el pan a sus clientes en diferentes tiendas. Zahida es una persona muy responsable quien siempre entrega sus pedidos a tiempo, y quien hace pan de muy buena calidad, razón por la cual cuenta con muchos clientes. Zahida solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de harina, ya que en este momento ha aumentado de precio y ella desea contar con el dinero necesario para comprarla por mayor, así de esta manera podrá contar con provisiones, así también desea comprar manteca, levadura y azúcar, todo para la elaboración del pan y pasteles.
texts.en:
Zahida Yaneth G. D., age 25, is a young mother who is responsible and a hard worker. She lives with her husband and children (ages 6 and 2) in the Department of La Libertad. Zahida manages a bakery located in her house. She is in charge of making bread and pastries and then sells them from her home. In addition, she delivers bread to her customers at different stores. Zahida is a responsible person who always tries to deliver her orders on time and produce bread of high quality. This explains why she has many customers.

Zahida is requesting a loan so that she can buy a large quantity of flour. Since the price of flour has increased for the moment, she wants to have the necessary funds to buy in bulk so that she can be well-stocked. She will also purchase butter, yeast, and sugar for making bread and pastries.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for making bread & pastries

loans.name: Esmeralda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Esmeralda de 37 años de edad es soltera, tiene un hijo, labora para la Alcaldia de Juigalpa en el area de atencion al contribuyente desde hace 9 años. 

Esta solicitando  su 8vo credito con el objetivo de reparar su casita cambiandole el techo que se encuentra en mal estado. 

Su mayor sueño es poder ir mejorando poco a poco su vivienda y brindarle a su familia las condiciones necesarias y que su hijo estudie y llegue a ser una persona de bien.
texts.en:
Esmeralda, 37, is single and has one child.  She has worked for the town of Juigalpa in the area of taxpayer assistance for 9 years. 

She is requesting her 8th loan, which she will use to repair her small house by replacing the roof, which is in bad condition.

Her main dream is to be able to gradually improve her house and provide her family with good living conditions.  She also dreams that her son will study and grow up to become a good person.

loans.use: to repair her roof

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.en:
Marie Claire is 30 years old and married with two children aged one and five years old. She runs a mechanic business in Byumba district in Rwanda.  She`s been in this business for two years and sells spare parts at the store.  Her business is open from 7am until 6pm.  She also earns some income from farming.  

This is Marie Claire's second loan requested through Vision Finance Company and she will use it to expand her business through purchasing spare parts to sell.  e extra income from this loan will help her to reinvest in the future.

loans.use: To buy more spare parts

loans.name: Akbarali

texts.en:
A. Akbarali a farmer. He learned to grow different kinds of vegetables from his parents. Now that Akbarali has his own family, he works his best to increase his yield to support the needs of his little children. Akbarali is 23 years old and has 2 children. He depends on his harvest for the future of his family. Almost all of his harvest is saved for family consumption, while the remainder is sold in the market by his wife. Akbarali is requesting a loan of 6000 Somoni. He will use the loan to buy the necessary fertilizers and seeds for his crop. His loan will give Akbarali better harvest. In this way, he will have more to give to his family. 

 
More about Tajikistan and IMON International

Tajikistan is known for its rich history, which includes a key post along the Silk Road and the end of Alexander the Great's rule. It has also produced great thinkers, philosophers, scientists and poets, including Rudaki, Avicenna, Ferdowsi, Omar Khayyam, Jomi, and Rumi. The country is home to communities that still speak the ancient Sogdian language, epic mountain passes, and a civilization that dates back to the 4th millennium BC. And, even today, it is a complex mixture of the Islamic faith, Soviet culture, New West culture and Central Asian traditions.

But Tajikistan is also the poorest of the former Soviet republics. The civil war, which ignited soon after its independence from the U.S.S.R., further damaged the already weak economy. In addition, 93% of the country is mountainous and only 7% of the land is arable. These conditions have resulted in high levels of unemployment and have forced hundreds of thousands to seek work in other countries, mainly Russia. While the people of Tajikistan are working to improve its agricultural production and manufacturing sector, nearly two-thirds of the population still live in abject poverty.

IMON's History

Since December 2007, IMON International has worked closely with Kiva and Kiva lenders to ensure that poor and low income clients represent a viable business proposition. Funds raised through Kiva have already been distributed to thousands of IMON International's clients and will continue to provide thousands more with permanent access to the varied financial services they need. To learn more about IMON International's work, please visit: www.imon.tj

loans.use: Purchase seeds and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Elie

texts.ar:
ايلي متزوج وله ارعة اولاد عمره 52سنة يعمل في بيع المواد الزراعية له في عمله 15 سنة يحب عمله ويطوره دائما
ايلي يحب عائلته كثيرا ويسعى الى تأمين مستقبل جيد لأولادهوتعليمهم بشكل جيد يعمل بكد ونشاط وله محبين كثر من محيطه
مقصود في عمله له تاريخ جيد كثيرا في المجموعة يريد من خلال طلب قرض له من المجموعة شراء بذور وحبوب جديدة لتوسيع
العمل يعاني ايلي من نقص في المادة لتطوير عمله وهذا ما يسعى جاهدا الى تحسينه
texts.en: Elie, 52, is married with 4 children. He has been working in selling agriculturA. products for 15 years. Elie likes his business and works on developing it. Elie loves his family very much and seeks to secure his children a safe future and to provide them with a good education. Ellie works hard and vigorously. He is loved in the neighborhood and is known for his good reputation among his clients. He has a very good credit history with A. Majmoua. He wants to get a new loan to buy seeds and grain to expand his business.  Elie lacks the necessary capitA. for developing his business, which he relentlessly works on improving.

loans.use: Purchase of seeds and grain

loans.name: José Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel P. A., tiene 21 años, es soltero, vive con los padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No Tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. VALLE ALTO se encuentra en el recinto Voluntad de Dios, pertenece al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto a la siembra de maíz y arroz.

José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembre de maíz y arroz, compra y vende los productos en ventanas en comercial Peña y vende en la casa o en el mercado de ventadas todos los días.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de insumos y semillas. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprar una casa.

Le gusta estudiar la Biblia.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel P. A. is 21 years old, he is single, and he lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, in the Los Rios province. He doesn't have children. 

The members of the communal bank named "Valle Alto, are originally from the Voluntad de Dios community in Ventanas. This group is primarily involved in short-cycle agriculture, such as corn and rice. 

Jose is an agriculturist who sows corn and rice. He buys and sells his products from the Pena market in Ventanas and he makes his sales from home or in the market in Ventanas every day. 

He requests a loan to sow corn, to purchase materials and seeds. With the support of this loan he will be able to provide for his needs, and to face challenges such as plagues, illness, and the changing weather. His dream is to purchase a house of his own. 

He enjoys studying the Bible.

loans.use: To purchas agricultural products and seeds.

loans.name: Thelma Margarita

texts.es: Thelma Margarita se dedica a una pulpería hace más 18 años, por lo que se siente muy segura de este medio de vida que le ha brindado a ella y su familia lo necesario. Esta no es la primera experiencia que obtiene con financiamientos pues ha sido muy gratificante para ella, ya que le ha ayudado a ofrecer los productos que sus clientes solicitan. El crédito es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, detergentes entre otros.  Desea seguir ampliando su negocio aun mas para poder dejarles a sus hijos un buen futuro y que ellos se hagan cargo.
texts.en: Thelma Margarita has been working in a small general store for over eighteen years. She feels very secure in her line of work, which has allowed her to fulfill her family's basic needs. This is not the first time she has received funding. The loan process has been very rewarding for her as it has helped her to offer her customers the products that they are looking for. She will use this loan to buy candy, soda, basic grains and detergent, among other things. She would like to expand her business even more so that she can provide her children with a brighter future and allow them to take charge of their lives.

loans.use: Purchase of goods for her store

loans.name: Kagongi Bakyara Twimukye Tukore-, Ntungamo Group

texts.en: K. Kellen is the leader of Kagongi Bakyara Twimukye Tukore-, Ntungamo. She is 48 years old and married with 8 children. Kellen has a retail shop in Mutojo that deals in general merchandise like sugar, salt, soap, cooking oil and so on. Her shop has been in existence for over 7 years. She is able to make 250,000/= as monthly profit from the shop. She also deals in the sale of matooke (plantains) from which she makes 90,000/= as weekly profit plus beans, groundnuts and so on. She is a very hard-working lady, very cooperative and flexible, and she aspires for business growth and a good-looking family. Most of the achievement that Kellen has got is the educational attainment for her family.

loans.use: Purchasing more stock for resale

loans.name: Komla Fo-Djifa

texts.fr: Monsieur  Komla   a    51  ans  et  père  de  2 enfants.   Pour s’occuper de  ses enfants, il exerce comme  activité  la  fabrication  et la vente des craies.  Il  cumule  3  ans  dans  cette  activité  et s’approvisionne  au grand  marché  de  Lomé.  Il sollicite  un prêt  pour satisfaire plus de  clients. Mais actuellement il n’a pas  de  stocks.
texts.en:
Mr. Komla is 51 years old and he is the father of two children. To take care of his children he makes and sells chalk. He has three years of experience in this activity. He gets his supplies at Grand Market of Lomé.

He is requesting a loan to meet a higher demand from his customers. However, he currently does not have any stock.

loans.use: Purchase of raw material to make chalk

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha vive en la zona de alto san Antonio que esta ubicado al este de la ciudad de La Paz  a veinte minutos del centro de la ciudad.  Ella se dedica a la costura desde hace más de veinte años. Anteriormente trabaja en una fabrica como costurera y desde hace dos años tiene un negocio independiente de costura y además ahí mismo tiene su  bazar - librería. La Sra. Martha es muy conocida ya que realiza costura de trajes de dama y algunos arreglos a vestidos y ropa de mujer.  Su esposo se llama Jacinto y se dedica al servicio de técnico eléctrico de movilidades. Ellos viven casa familiar de los padres de don Jacinto. Los hijos de doña Martha y don Jacinto ya son mayores y viven de manera independiente. con el dinero del credito comprara tela para la confeccion de algunas prendas de vestir y material escolar y de escritorio para su libreria, Uno de los mayores anhelos de ellos ahorrar lo suficiente con su trabajo y así poder comprar una casa, la Sra. Martha es una persona muy trabajadora, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señora Martha lives in the Alto San Antonio area, which is located 20 min. to the east of downtown La Paz.  She has made her living as a dressmaker for more than twenty years.  Previously she worked as a seamstress in a factory, but for the last two years she has run an independent sewing bussiness and, out of the same space, a bookstore that sells miscellaneous goods.  Sra. Martha is very well-known, since she makes women's suits and mends dresses and women's clothing.  Her husband, Jacinto, makes his living as an electrical technician in mobile services.  They live in don Jacinto's parent's family home.  Doña Martha and don Jacinto's children are grown and live independently from their parents.  With the money from the loan, doña Martha will purchase fabric to make some garments as well as school and office supplies for her store.  One of their greatest wishes is to save enough from their work to be able to buy a house.  Sra. Martha is a very hard working person, and she is grateful to the institution for the help they have given her.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and school and office supplies.

loans.name: Camino Real Group

texts.es:
La señora Maria Hilda pertenece al grupo llamado “CAMINO REAL” comenta que le pusieron ese nombre al grupo porque antes le decían así al camino que pasa por su casa y termina ese camino en las ruinas arqueológicas  de Zirahuato, Doña Hilda tiene 46 años de edad, comenta que estudio la secundaria y que ya no continúo con sus estudios porque la preparatoria le quedaba retirado de sus casa y no le alcanzaba el dinero que le daban para los pasajes. Doña Hilda como es conocida por sus amigos y vecinos se dedica a la venta de ropa como blusas, pantalones de niños y caballeros, pants, playeras etc. Ella tiene con este tipo de negocio aproximadamente 15 años y vende su ropa en diferentes localidades como Zirahuato, Benito Juárez, ella ofrece la ropa a amigas y conocidas, las vende al contado o en pagos. Comenta doña Hilda que ella empezó con esta actividad por que es una forma de ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos de la casa. Ella surte la ropa en la cuidad de Toluca estado de México en diferentes tianguis de esa ciudad. Una de sus situaciones difíciles por las que esta pasando es que ha dado en pagos ropa y luego no le pagan y ha tenido perdidas de dinero. Doña Hilda esta casada con el señor Benito el cual tiene una huerta de aguacate, durazno y cultiva flores de gladiola, ellos tuvieron 4 hijos ya todos casados. La meta que tiene doña Hilda es abrir un local en su casa para abrirlo diario y estar al pendiente de su casa. El Señor Gildardo, es parte del grupo “CAMINO REAL” el es originario de la localidad de Puentecillas un lugar muy cerca de las ruinas arqueológicas de Zirahuato, el tiene 49 años de edad y estudio hasta el tercer año de secundaria y ya no continuo con sus estudios porque le ayudaba a trabajar a sus papas ya que eran mas hermanos. Don Gil como es conocido por sus amistades está pidiendo un préstamo a Fundación Realidad para el mantenimiento y compostura de un carro de taxi el tiene con esta actividad aproximadamente 14 años y dice que le gusta mucho su trabajo por que conoce a mucha gente y a varios lugares del país, aunque una de las situaciones difíciles por las que esta pasando es que ya hay mucha competencia y abecés no gana mucho auque su esposa le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, también la otra problemática que tubo es que desgraciadamente tubo un accidente y su vehiculo se la descompuso y quiere mandarlo arreglar ya que es su fuente de trabajo. Don Gil esta casado con la señora Maria Ortega la cual es maestra de un jardín de niños, ellos tienen 4 hijos pero tres ya son casados y nada mas una vive con ellos de nombre Yoselin la cual estudia la universidad en Morelia Michoacán. La meta que tiene don Gildardo es sembrar aguacate para hacer una huerta de este fruto y tener otra fuente de empleo para poder darles a su hija la menor una carrera que la respalde cuando este grande.
Los otros dos integrantes se llaman Eloy Sebastián Márquez y Mariela B. Guzmán ellos invertirán sus préstamos en frutas y verduras y tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Maria Hilda belongs to the group called “Camino Real” (Great Highway). She said that they named the group this because this is the name of the road that goes by her house and ends in the archeological ruins of Zirahuato. Mrs. Hilda is 46 years old. She has studied in secondary school but she didn’t finish her studies because the preparatory school is far from her house and she didn’t have the money to pay for transportation. Mrs. Hilda is well known among her friends and neighbors. She sells clothes such as blouses, pants for children and men, bathing suits, etc. She has been doing this business for the past fifteen years. She sells her clothes in different places such as Zirahuato and Benito Juarez. She sells her clothes to friends and acquaintances that pay her in payments or by demand. She started this business as a way to help her husband with the family’s expenses.  She buys the clothes at different outlets in Toluca City in the state of Mexico. One of the difficulties that she has is that her customers pay her in payments but they don’t always pay their payments and she looses the money. Mrs Hilda is married to Mr. Benito who has a small farm where he grows avocados, peaches and also cultivates gladiola flowers. They have four children, all of which are married. Her goal is to open a clothing business in her home that can be open daily. 
Mr. Gildardo is part of the group called “Camino Real”.  He is originally from Puntecillas, a place that is close to the archeological ruins of Zirahuato. He is 49 years old and has completed his studies up to the third year of secondary school. He didn’t finish his studies because he had to help his parents as they had other children to support. Mr. Gil is known for his friendships. He is asking for this loan, from Fundacion Real, for the maintenance and repair of his taxi. He has been driving a taxi for fourteen years. He likes this job as he gets to know many people and places in the country. One of the difficulties that he has is that there is a lot of competition and sometimes he doesn’t earn a lot. His wife helps with the household expenses. The other problem that he has had is that he had an accident and his taxi was damaged. He needs to have it repaired, as it is the way he earns a living. Mr. Gil is married to Maria Ortega who is a kindergarten teacher. They have four children, three of which are married. None of the children live with them. Their daughter, Yoselin, studies at the university in Morelia, Michoacán. Mr. Gildardo’s goal is to have a small farm where he can grow avocados so that he has another source of income. He wants his daughter to have a good career that can support her when she grows up. The other members of “Camino Real” are named Eloy and Mariela. They will invest their loan money in buying fruits and vegetables and buying groceries.

loans.use: to buy clothes for women, men and children

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 23 years old and single. He lives with two family members; only one of them works. 

Hussein has been the owner of a barber shop since 2008. He has four years' experience; he is specialized in haircuts for men and children. He has an excellent reputation and he is well known in his area.


 He is requesting a $2400 loan to buy new shaving machines and a massage machine and to renovate his shop. He aspires for a better future through good financial returns.

loans.use: To buy new shaving machines and a massage machine.

loans.name: Leonel Antonio

texts.es:
Leonel O. es un agricultor que ha dedicado su vida a la siembra de maíz, fríjol y café, sin embargo el invierno de la zona le ha generado algunos problemas por los que ha tenido que optar por la cría de animales como pollos y cerdos para complementar su trabajo en la agricultura.
 
Leonel aprendió este oficio de sus padres y desde los diez años está trabajando en este sector. Con sus cosechas a sacado a su familia a adelante y por eso está buscando el capital necesario para la compra de cuido de engorde para sus animales y fumigantes para evitar las plagas en sus cultivos. Esto le permitirá mejorar su producción y por consiguiente su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Leonel O. is a farmer who has dedicated his life to growing corn, beans and coffee. However, the winter season in his area has caused some problems, leading him to decide to raise animals such as chickens and pigs to complement his other agricultural work. 
 
Leonel learned this profession from his parents, and he has been working in this sector for ten years. With his harvests, he has helped his family get ahead, and for this reason he is seeking the capital he needs to buy supplies to fatten up his animals, as well as fumigation supplies to avoid pests and diseases in his crops. This will permit him to improve his production and, as a consequence, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his chickens and pigs and for his crops.

loans.name: Nursiya's Group

texts.en: Nursiya U. is the leader of this group. She is 40 and married to a constructor. Together with her husband, she brings up two sons and two daughters. The first son works in Russia; the second son is a handicapped person; the older daughter just entered school; and the younger daughter is preschool age (under 7). Eleven years ago, Nurisya collected money (1,500 soms) and purchased three livestock animals for breeding. Since that moment, she has been engaged in livestock breeding. In this way, she earns money to meet the family's needs. With money received from the loan, Nurisya wants to purchase more livestock, and for this purpose, she applied for the loan. In the future, she plans to build a kiosk near the house. Where Did This Loan Come From? This loan is brought to you by Mol Bulak Finance (MBF), a young, ambitious and socially-focused microfinance institution in Kyrgyzstan. MBF is strongly committed to the principles of sustainable development and upholds the triple "P" bottom line – People (building human capital and taking care of its customers as well as society), Planet (keeping environmentally friendly) and Profit (earning revenue to expand autonomously). MBF is the only microfinance institute in Kyrgyzstan that delivers its services to customers 365 days a year. To learn more about MBF and view a video presentation about the organization, please visit: http://www.kiva.org/about/aboutPartner?id=135. If you would like to support and learn more about Kyrgyzstan and microfinance in Central Asia, please join our Lending Team - Supporters of Kyrgyzstan – Mol Bulak Finance at http://kiva.org/team/kyrgyzstan. Members will get special updates and news from Kiva Fellows in Kyrgyzstan and from the MBF staff.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is 39 years, a widow, and has two school going children.  She has been selling fruits and vegetables in Naivasha town for the last four years.

She was introduced to KADET LTD by her friend and this will be her first loan. She plans to use the loan amount to add to her shop's stock, which includes cabbages, maize, and carrots.

In the future, Tabitha hopes to buy a pick up truck, which she will use to ferry the produce direct from the farms for herself.

loans.use: add stock in her shop like cabbages, carrots, and maize.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married woman with three children all of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is rent. For the past three months Alice has operated a potato-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. Alice faces a major challenge in the high cost of transportation in her business. She dreams of expanding her business in the future. 

With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase sacks of potatoes for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of potatoes for sale.

loans.name: Mario Efrain

texts.es: Mario Efrain, cuenta con treinta y seis años de edad, vive junto a Don Mario y Doña Blanca sus papás, a Efrain desde muy pequeño siempre le gusto bailar y su gusto por este arte fue incrementando a medidas pasaron los años, fue así como su gusto por refinar este Arte le permitió instalar un centro de baile en un local en el centro de la ciudad en la que vive, en donde los clientes que le visitan se divierten sanamente haciendo aerobics ó bailando un amplio repertorio de géneros musicales que él muy bien baila y como instructor dirige. Los clientes que le visitan bailan para bajar de peso o simplemente relajarse y salir por un momento de sus cotidianas vidas. El negocio de Efrain cada vez mejora gracias a que sus clientes se encuentran muy a gusto con esta actividad, él ahora desea comprar con el crédito que solicita a INTEGRAL un nuevo equipo de sonido que haga vibrar aún más a sus clientes y como él dice:  “suden todo lo malo que traen y lo dejen acá”, confía en que con esta inversión sus mismo clientes le contacten con mas amigos y los lleven a que disfruten en una sesión de baile en que las personas se alegren por estar en perfecta condición de salud.-
texts.en:
Mario Efrain is 36 years old and lives together with his parents: Mario and Blanca.  Efrain has enjoyed dancing since he was very young and his love for this art increased as he got older.  His desire to refine the art allowed him to set up a dance center in premises in the center of the town where he lives.  Clients visit him and have healthy fun, doing aerobics or dancing a wide repertoire of musical styles that Efrain himself dances very well and leads as an instructor.  The clients who visit his business dance to lose weight or simply to relax and escape their daily lives for a while.

Efrain's business is constantly improving thanks to the fact that his clients feel very happy and comfortable with this activity.  Efrain would like to use the loan that he is requesting from INTEGRAL to buy a new sound system that will move his clients even more.  As he says "they sweat out all the bad stuff that they bring with them and leave it here".  He believes that, with this new investment, his clients will put him in touch with more friends and bring them along to enjoy a dance session in which people are delighted to be in perfect health.

loans.use: to buy a sound system for his dance classes

loans.name: Helena

texts.en: Helena is 45 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married and has a seventh grade education. She has four children, ranging in age from 17 to 25 years. Only one child lives with her. For the past thirteen years, Helena has been running a food center where she sells delicious Liberian food. One thing she enjoys is being self-employed. She is requesting a loan to purchase two bags of rice, 15 gallons of oil, and spices for her business. She plans to build a house for her and her children in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase two bags of rice, 15 gallons of oil, and spices for her business.

loans.name: Grover Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Grover es cliente antiguo que trabaja como jardinero en un hotel cinco estrellas de la ciudad de la paz, desde hace tiempo y en domicilios particulares donde hace mantenimiento de los jardines, vive en la casa de sus suegros con su esposa Ángela ella es enfermera, no tienen hijos ambos trabajan, el Sr. Grover hace fumigados para el mantenimiento de jardinería trabaja independientemente con los fumigados en domicilios particulares,  El sr. Grover recientemente se compro un vehículo el cual en este momento requiere de mantenimiento ya que lo pondrá a trabajar, razón por lo que solicita el crédito, es una persona trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Mr. Grover is a former client who has been working as a gardener for a long time.  He works at a five-star hotel in the city of La Paz and at private homes where he maintains the gardens.  He lives in the home of his in-laws with his wife Ángela who is a nurse.  They don’t have children and they both work. Mr. Grover sprays the gardens with insecticides for maintenance purposes and performs this service independently at private homes.  Mr. Grover recently bought a vehicle that requires maintenance at the moment so it will work.  This is the reason he is requesting the loan.  He is a hard-working person and he is grateful to the institution for offering him support..

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Bertha Gertrudis

texts.en:
Bertha lives and works in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, one of the largest cities in Ecuador with 500,000 inhabitants. But you'd never guess the size of the city from its tranquil pace of life. Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas is in a tropical, humid area of Ecuador, renowned for its natural beauty, huge markets and its trade in livestock - the largest in the country.

Bertha lives in her own home with her partner Marco and their two children. Bertha is 39 years old, and her children are 3 and 12. Marco works for a public utilities company, which keeps him busy all day, thus Bertha works alone in her business operating a clothing store. Bertha shares her free time with her children.

This is Bertha's second loan this year from Kiva's partner, Fundación Alternativa. She will use the loan to buy more merchandise to sell. Her biggest challenge at work are the hours: she must rise early in the morning, sometimes as early as 2am, to buy clothes to sell in her store. She also works long hours during the day, as the Santo Domingo markets foster high competition between vendors. She hopes the loan will allow her to boost her business and her earnings, so that she can continue to work towards a brighter future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell in her store

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 44 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Vilma has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for five years and also earns income from raising pigs.

Vilma aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Pregreno

texts.en:
Pregreno is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children. 

Pregreno has a shop that sells green and yellow bananas and coconuts. He has had this business for five years. He has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy bananas and coconuts to sell.

Pregreno has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Pregreno hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy bananas and coconuts to sell

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom is 54 yeas old and her husband To is 56 years old.  They have been married since 1980 and have five children, two sons and three daughters.  Three are married and live in separate homes, one is a teacher and the others are in school.  They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh about 25 kilometers away.
Sarom stays at home and does housework.  The main source of income is from her husband who is a motor taxi driver.  She is asking for her first loan of $300 to concrete the foundation of her house.

loans.use: to concrete the foundation of her house.

loans.name: Umoja Ni Nguvu 1 Group

texts.fr:
Mariam est une commerçante âgée de 33ans qui habite au quartier Bwiza de la Mairie de Bujumbura.Elle fait le commerce d’articles divers(savons,produits cosmetiques pour dames,dentifrices,stylos,carnets de notes,etc) dans un kiosque depuis 3ans. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 6e année primaire. Elle est veuve avec 3 enfants qui étudient dont 2 sont a l’école secondaire. 
Le crédit Kiva  de 400,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital en achetant beaucoup d’articles divers (savons, produits cosmétiques pour dames, dentifrices, stylos, carnets de notes,etc) à revendre afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« UMOJA NI NGUVU 1».
texts.en:
Mariam is a 33-year-old trader who lives in Bwiza, a district of Bujumbura. She is a widow with 3 children, two of whom go to secondary school. Mariam completed 5 years of primary school and has been selling a variety of products such as soap, women's cosmetics, toothpaste, pens and notepads from a kiosk for 3 years. She will use the loan of 400 000 Burundese francs to restock on products which will be resold for a good profit.

Mariam is part of the community group "UMOJA NI NGUVU 1".

loans.use: to buy various products for resale (soap, women's cosmetics, toothpaste, pens, notepads, etc.)

loans.name: Emerson

texts.es: Emerson es natural de la ciudad de Santa Rosa, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero. Reside en la hermosa selva ayacuchana, donde tiene su propia casa construida a base de adobe y techo de calamina. Él es albañil, sus padres le enseñaron este oficio desde muy niño, y con la experiencia adquirida se convirtió en albañil, ahora realiza obres de construcción donde cimienta viviendas, puentes, escuelas y alcantarillas. Es muy reconocido por lo trabajos que realiza, pues trabaja con maestros, operarios, oficiales y peones cada quien dividido por sus propios rangos. Se siente muy a gusto con su labor porque cada vez va adquiriendo experiencias nuevas por estar en contacto con los ingenieros civiles. Asimismmo nos comenta que su trabajo le es muy rentable e incluso cobra por adelantado por sus servicios prestados, pero esta vez le falta dinero para refaccionar las fachadas de su vivienda es por ello que acude a MFP para facilitarle el crédito. Los planes que tiene en mente es seguir creciendo y obteniendo buenos ingresos y así adquirir muchos bienes. Este será su tercer crédito con MFP, sabe que éste crédito le ayudará mucho con el propósito de su trabajo. Los 1,000 soles que solicita, le servirá para comprar materiales de construcción y así refaccionar la fachada de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Emerson is from the city of Santa Rosa.  He’s 21 years old and single.  He lives in the beautiful Ayacucho jungle where he has his own house made from adobe; it has a plywood roof.  He’s a bricklayer; his parents taught him this occupation when he was still a boy.  He’s become a bricklayer with all the experience he’s gained and now works on construction projects where he builds foundations for homes, bridges, schools and drainage systems.  He is very well known for the work he does because he works with master builders, employees, officials and day laborers each divided up according to rank.  He feels very comfortable because he learns new experiences every time by being in contact with civil engineers.  He also comments that his work is very profitable and sometimes even is paid in advance for services rendered but on this occasion he’s lacking sufficient money to repair his house’s facades and this is why he’s calling on MFP to request a loan.  The plans he has are to continue growing and obtaining better income to acquire more assets.

This will be his third MFP loan.  He knows the loan will be very helpful for his work’s goals.  He will use the 1000 new soles to buy building materials and supplies to repair the facade of his house.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies for his house.

loans.name: Edier

texts.es: Darlin Suyen de 24 años de edad, labora como Técnico en estadística en el Ministerio de Educación en el área de Educación de adultos, desde hace 5 años. es una joven emprendedora, que a salido adelante junto a su familia, el cual estudia y trabaja a la vez.  Solicita su 2do crédito para invertirlo en compra de materiales de construcción y así hacerle mejoras a su casa de habitación,  en su centro de trabajo es bien reconocida por sus buenas relaciones humanas que la caracterizan al igual que en su comunidad, sus metas para el futuro es tener un hogar donde haya condiciones que a ella la hagan sentirse realizada como familia.
texts.en:
Darlin Suyen is 24 years old and she has worked as a Statistical Technician for the Ministry of Education in the area of Adult Education for the past 5 years. She is an enterprising young woman who works and studies simultaneously and has come out on top together with her family.

She is applying for her second loan to invest in the purchase of construction materials to make improvements to her home. She is recognized and noted for her good human relations in her workplace, as well as in her community. 

Her goal for the future is to have a home where the conditions allow the achievement of a sense of family.

loans.use: to buy materials

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria Del Carmen se dedica a la destace de cerdo y venta de nacatamales.  Maria tiene 1 hijo a su cargo que ha sacado adelante gracias a este negocio es que podido brindar los gastos necesarios de su hogar. Siempre está buscando la manera de innovar con su negocio ofreciéndoles buenos precios a sus clientes. Solicita el crédito para la compra de cerdos ya que tiene buenas ofertas para comprar.
texts.en: Maria Del Carmen butchers pigs and sells tamales. Maria has 1 child under her care who she has raised thanks to her business with which she has also been able to cover her household expenses. She is always looking for ways of innovating her business by offering her customers good prices. She is asking for the loan to buy pigs as she has been offered some good deals.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Catheline

texts.en: Catheline is 38 years old. She has six children aged between 5 and 14; all go to school. Catheline sells clothes and she has spent six years in that business. She has requested the loan to buy more clothes to sell. She expects to use the profits from the business to pay school fees and put aside savings. She has the anticipation of seeing her business grow to the extent of owning the large store.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mahutin2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHUTIN2 est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Christine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Christine est âgée de 39 ans et vit au Bénin. Christine n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Christine est mariée à un certain Basile. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Christine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les charges de la famille.  Afin de contribuer aux diverses charges de la famille, Christine vend des fruits dans un marché du Bénin. Christine s’approvisionne dans un village du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Christine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHUTIN2, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: The Mahutin2 group is composed of three people living in the same neighborhood. This is the second time that the group is seeking financing from ALIDé in order to expand its business. Christine, the group’s representative, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Christine is 39 years old and lives in Benin. Christine is married to a man by the name of Basile. They have three dependent children, all in school. Christine lives together with her husband and children. The spouses jointly provide for family needs. In order to contribute to the family budget, Christine sells fruits at a market in Benin. Christien stocks up in a village in Benin. With the goal of meeting customer demand and increasing her sales volume and her revenues, Christine, together with the other members of the Mahutin2 group, is seeking a second loan from ALIDé. The first loan has been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy baskets of fruits

loans.name: Khiraymon

texts.ru: Хираймон проживает в городе Душанбе. Возраст, 55 лет. Замужем. Имеет четверых детей. Она уже год занимается торговлей. У нее имеется собственный магазин, где она продает продукты питания. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Khiraymon is a resident of Dushanbe, capital of Tajikistan. She is 55 years old, married and has four children. Khiraymon has been working in retail for a year. She owns a store where she sells groceries. Khiraymon is taking out this loan to purchase additional goods for her store and so increase inventory turnover.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary groceries

loans.name: Villa Santa Rosa Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Villa Santa Rosa” está conformado por 11 socios entusiastas la cual llevan trabajando 8 meses  con el Programa- Prosperidad donde Yolanda es una de las socias activas del grupo. Yolanda tiene 53 años, es separada y tiene 01 hija. Anteriormente Yolanda se dedicaba  a la crianza de cerdos poco a poco fue ahorrando y así pudo instalar una bodega en su domicilio donde lleva más 13 años  ofreciendo sus productos de primera necesidad, gracias a su esfuerzo a podido ayudar a su hija ya que nos manifiesta que es madre soltera de 02 pequeños, también pudo mejorar su vivienda. Ella solicito el crédito para invertir en su negocio comprando arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos y bebidas por mayor ya que de esa manera le sale económico.El deseo de Yolanda es de seguir creciendo en su negocio y así seguir apoyando a sus nietos que son su motivo para seguir adelante. La Alcancía Comunal “Villa Santa Rosa” están muy agradecidos por el crédito brindado. Dialu no ha podido estar presente por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en: The “Villa Santa Rosa” community bank consists of 11 enthusiastic members who have been working with Programa-Prosperidad (Prosperity Program) for eight months. Yolanda is an active member of the group. She is 53 years old, separated from her husband and has a daughter. Previously she made a living raising pigs, saving little by little, and in this way she was able to set up a convenience store in her home. This is where she has been for the past 13 years, offering groceries of primary necessity. Thanks to her hard work she has been able to help her daughter, a single mother of two young children, as well as make improvements to her home. Yolanda is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of rice, sugar, milk, noodles and soft drinks at wholesale since it's more economical. Her goal is to keep growing her business so she can continue supporting her grandchildren, who are her motivation to keep moving forward. "Villa Santa Rosa" is very grateful for the loan. Dialu couldn't be present for the photo because of her work.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, noodles and soft drinks.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is a 29 year old a business lady. She is married to Martin. They are blessed with one child, age 3 years. She has been running a stationary shop for the past two years with the monthly income of KES 10,000 which she uses to support her family. 
Judith is applying for her first loan term with KADET after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Judith will use the loan to add a stock of printing papers and plain papers to her shop. With the anticipated profit from the business she will educate her child. Her hopes and dreams are to expand her stationary shop  and  improve the family’s living standard.

loans.use: To add a stock of printing papers and plain papers to her shop

loans.name: Benigno

texts.es: Benigno es socio del Banco Comunal Milenio, tiene 67 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa en la calle, también va a las ferias, es padre de 6 hijos, es casado, es socio de Finca Perú desde hace 1 año, el siente que ha progresado mucho en todo el tiempo que esta en Finca, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a ser un mejor padre, Finca le ayudó a poder trazarse metas y ha cumplirlas gracias a sus ahorros, aprendió a ser responsable y así tener un buen negocio. Ahora con el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa. Lo que el desea es poder tener un carro para poder salir con su familia.
texts.en: Benigno is a member of the Milenio communal bank. He is 67 years old and makes a living selling clothing in the street. He also goes to fairs. He is the father of six children, is married, and has been a member of Finca Perú for one year. He feels that he has made great progress in all the time that he's been part of the Finca.The trainings helped him to be a better father. Finca has helped him to be able to set goals for himself and meet them. Thanks to his savings, he has learned to be responsible and in this way run a good business. He will invest the loan he is requesting in purchasing clothing. What he would like is to have a car to be able to go out with his family.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Cleta

texts.es:
Cleta, de 47 años es una mujer alegre y laboriosa, esta casada con Odilon de 50 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 02 hijos Guísela de 16 años y Niker de 09 y juntos viven en su propia casa. Cleta, empezó su aventura como agricultora desde muy niña en las tierras de sus padres. Su pasión  por el agro le llevo a adquirir sus propias tierras, comprados con el esfuerzo de su  esposo y de si misma; viene trabajando 40 años en su propia parcela; en la cual  cultiva plantas de cacao. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de extraer con mayor rapidez los frutos de cada producto y de esa manera logra avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su trabajo. Se siente muy comprometida con su labor; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que los frutos de sus plantas le resultan, así obteniendo buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de producto vendido. El crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es crédito numero 03 con MFP, esta dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada por poner orden al grupo.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; comprara plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en: Cleta, 47, is a very happy and hard-working woman. She is married to Odilon, 50, with whom she has two children: Guísela, 16, and Niker, 9. They all live together in their own home. Cleta starting working in agriculture when she was very young, working on her parents' land. Her passion for farming brought her to acquire her own land, a purchase thanks to the efforts of herself and her husband, and she has been working on her own farm for nearly 40 years, cultivating cocoa. During the harvest season she counts on day laborers who pick the products quickly so she can reap the benefits faster. She feels very fulfilled with her work because she has seen her daily efforts bear fruit, earning good profits for every kilogram she sells. She is requesting the loan to acquire cocoa plants to graft so her crops will mature in less time. But for now what she wants most is to buy more land to expand her harvest and increase her production. This is her third loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she promises to make her payments on time so she can receive more loans in the future. She is a very respected member of her community bank because she brings order to the group.

loans.use: to purchase cocoa plants to graft.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Forty-seven-year-old Monica is married to Joseph and has four children between the ages of 7 and 25 years. She has been in the hotel business for the past eight years and earns a monthly income of KES 10,000.

She has requested a loan worth KES 15,000 to purchase packets of sugar, salt, and baking flour for sale.

The profit earned from the business will help her repay her loan. Her dream is to prosper in the future. This is her first loan.

loans.use: to purchase, packets of sugar, salt, and baking flour.
